description:
A service that allows to control a rectangular matrix of monochrome LEDs.
To stream the state of the screen, use [LED Matrix display](/services/led-matrix-display) instead.

contents.name: enabled
contents.description: Disables or enables the whole screen.

contents.name: brightness
contents.description: Sets the general brightness of the LEDs.

contents.name: rows
contents.description: Number of rows on the screen

contents.name: columns
contents.description: Number of columns on the screen
